page.title: 01PENDLESIDE
page.content: {Rural area}part of{Pendle District N.E {Lancs.}comprises Barley, Newchurch, Roughlee, Sabden Fold and part of Wheatley Lane.{Dominant feature Pendle {Hill,}557 m.high.{Pendle Water,}stream formerly a power source for spinning/ weaving.{Leisure/Tourism}Car Park for 128.Tourist Info.Walks,Fishing,Wild- life.{Hotel/catering}Pendle Inn,Barley Mow Restaurant,Higher Whitehough Farm, Barley Post Office.{Churches:}St.Mary (Parish)Newchurch.Methodist,Barley, Inghamite, Wheatley Lane.{Schools:Camp (Whitehough)serves County as resident- ial Outdoor Pursuits Centre,Primary Schools at Roughlee and Newchurch.{His {tory:}Neolithic finds near Pendle,Vacc ary at Barelegh in1266.Sabden Old Hall 1577,WhitehoughFarm 1593.PendleWitches fromRoughlee andNewchurch hanged 1612. {Main activity:}Dairy &sheep farming, butsome new houses attracted commuters
